census2020download 2.2.2
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    add_block_radius_miles_to_dt()
    Create a new column in the data.table passed to this function (by reference)
    blockid2fips
    Census FIPS code of each US Census 2020 block
    blockpoints
    lat/lon location of internal point of each Census 2020 block, used in EJAM package
    blockwts
    2020 Census block weights (population as share of overall block group)
    block_radius_miles_from_area_sqmi()
    simple formula to calculate radius given area Just the square root of (area/pi)
    census2020download census2020download-package
    2020 Census Blocks and Tools to Download from FTP
    census2020_clean()
    start to clean up download block data
    census2020_download()
    Download Census 2020 data files from FTP
    census2020_get_data()
    Download and clean up block data census 2020 (for EJAM)
    census2020_read()
    Compile Census 2020 block data for all US states once downloaded and unzipped used by census2020_get()
    census2020_save_datasets()
    Create each separate data.table, and optionally save for use in a package This was just done once, to create datasets for the EJAM package
    census2020_unzip()
    unzip Census 2020 zipped files already downloaded
    census_col_names_map
    Table that maps some Census variable names to short friendly variable names
    lookup_states
    basic information about US States from 2023
    quaddata
    xyz location of internal point of each Census 2020 block, for spatial index in EJAM

    Developed by Mark Corrales.
